idea-plugin.name: CSS Extractor
idea-plugin.description:
CSS Selector Extractor

Description:
CSS Extractor is a powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin designed to streamline the process of working with CSS in projects involving HTML and JSX.

Key Features:
Selector Extraction: Analyzes HTML or JSX code and extracts class selectors.
Clipboard Copying: Extracted selectors are formatted and copied to the clipboard.
Supports Multiple Formats: Works with both HTML and JSX.

Usage Scenario:
Ideal for web developers and front-end engineers.

Easy to Use:
Extract CSS selectors directly from your code with a simple right-click.

Installation:
Install from the JetBrains products plugin marketplace.
